attributes.action: Close the borders to illegal migration,turn the boats away. Clear the backlog
attributes.additional_details: This is costing the tax payer an estimate £6 million a day and the general sentiment is that the country is being facing a illegal immigration invasion where the amount of people is draining public resources from the people who obey the laws of the country
attributes.background: The public sentiment is illegal immigration is out of control, we simple can't afford to spend an estimate £6 millions a day. The only way to safely deal with the problem is close the border to illegal entry and clear the backlog, use military resources to turn boats away.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641012
